Package library.geometry

Class Shapes

java.lang.Object
library.geometry.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Polygon
public abstract class Shapes
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class presenting a geometric shape.

      Debug draw method for shape.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D object to draw to
      paintSettings - Colour settings to draw the objects to screen with
      camera - Camera class used to convert points from world space to view space
